plot: A routine estate sale lands Melinda in the center of dark forces battling for the soul of a little girl who's been trapped in a violently haunted house for years.

Having survived Pres. Bedford's murder attempt and fearing for Ned's safety, Delia wants no more involvement with Melinda's paranormal activities. That doesn't stop Ned from helping Melinda and Eli deal with a multiple haunting at an abandoned house (much against Delia's wishes). Despite an unusual lack of informational sources, they pit themselves against the powerful, wheelchair-bound ghost of a fake medium with a special attachment to the shadows and a hunger for bringing ghost children into her home. And that doesn't cover all the ghosts involved.—statmanjeff
